XI.iii.1.B.2.f
.
Burial Claim Received After the SC Burial Allowance Is Paid
When a claim for SC burial allowance is received after the SC burial allowance has been paid to the proper claimant, deny the new claim for the SC burial allowance and review the claim for entitlement to the transportation benefit.
Note
:  Per
38 CFR 3.103(b)(3)(iii)
, if evidence reasonably indicates that a beneficiary is deceased, due process is not required.
References
:  For more information on
due process procedures, see
M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, 1. B
, and
the transportation benefit, see
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, 1.B.6
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B  - Burial Benefits
